This endpoint returns an system jwt token. The jwt token returned from this request is automatically added to the postman environment token variable.
This endpoint returns a staff jwt token. The jwt token returned from this request is automatically added to the postman environment token variable.
This endpoint returns an organization jwt token. The jwt token returned from this request is automatically added to the postman environment token variable.
This endpoint returns an individual jwt token. The jwt token returned from this request is automatically added to the postman environment token variable.
This endpoint returns an anonymous jwt token. The jwt token returned from this request is automatically added to the postman environment token variable.
This endpoint sends a password request to the recipient.
This endpoint resets the recipients password.

Create a Camunda Deployment.

Update the Deployment Name and Key/Value of the .bpmn file in the Body.

body.raw:
{
  "id": "2b18bc01-a02b-4b54-9bff-2259cb421d0b",
  "name": "Review something!",
  "description": "This have to be done very urgent",
  "priority" : 30,
  "assignee" : "Staff:e32f09b7-e1cf-4a91-a0e1-6822bf47a662",
  "owner" : null,
  "delegationState" : "PENDING",
  "due" : "2014-08-30T10:00:00",
  "followUp" : "2014-08-25T10:00:00",
  "candidateGroup": "8454c987-cbc5-4a24-ba1a-d420283caabd",
  "tenantId" : null
}

request.description: This endpoint provides a sandbox to test and debug functionality. It is only available in the DEV environment.
This endpoint returns the list of health check statuses and the overall health status of the microservice.
This endpoint returns a specific health check status.
This endpoint returns the list of configurations.
This endpoint returns a specific configuration.
This endpoint edits a specific configuration.
This endpoint returns a list of access cards.
This endpoint returns a specific access card.
This endpoint adds an access card to the list.
This endpoint edits a specific access card.
This endpoint deletes a specific access card from the list.
This endpoint returns the list of available permissions.
This endpoint returns a list of statistics.
This endpoint returns the case count statistic.
This endpoint returns the case count statistic where the state is open.
This endpoint returns the case count statistic where the state is closed.
This endpoint returns a list of cases.
This endpoint returns a specific case.
This endpoint adds a case to the list.

originalRequest.description: This endpoint adds a case to the list.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Link
header.description: Used to express a typed relationship with another resource, where the relation type is defined by RFC 5988

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-ChromeLogger-Data
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Content-Type-Options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: X-Debug-Token
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Debug-Token-Link
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

request.description: This endpoint edits a specific case.

header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

request.description: This endpoint deletes a specific text from the list.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Link
header.description: Used to express a typed relationship with another resource, where the relation type is defined by RFC 5988

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-ChromeLogger-Data
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Content-Type-Options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.description: Custom header
